title: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When trying to click on the first Combo, it does not take focus.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, the focus caret does not move to it.
EB: The focus caret should be in the first Combo titled 'Host:' when it is clicked.
SR: To reproduce the issue, open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog. Press the 'Tab' key and observe that the focus moves to the second Combo titled 'Repository Path:'.
